Package lab2

Class Watch

java.lang.Object
lab2.Watch
public class Watch
extends java.lang.Object
A simple Watch. A Watch keeps track of a long value in seconds. Users can change the time value of the Watch through other methods. A Watch provides a method to get and set the time value of the Watch.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private long startTime
    The watch time value startTime stored in seconds, value data field has long data type and initialized to zero

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Watch()
    no-arh constructor that constructs watch object by setting startTime value to zero
    Watch​(long value)
    Initialize this watch to have the specified time value.

    • incrbyHours

      public void incrbyHours​(int value)
      Increment the time value by any given number of hours. Remember that the watch store time in seconds only
      Parameters:
      value - input value represents the number of hours to increment the time value
      Precondition:

      Precondition

      The input value should be positive value>0

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns the string to print the watch object if Watch c = new Watch(12501); then c.toString() returns the string

      "Watch Time is 3 Hours, 28 Minutes, and 21 Seconds.".
